Caption: Figure 2. Composition of Enron organizational positions.
Figure 1. An email processed by EmailTime. ’From’, ‘To’ and ‘Cc’ fields were specified. We used these terms throughout the paper.

Figure 5. Results from size of Sent email. A) Average of normalized number of Small, Medium and Large sent emails for organizational positions. B) Average number of Medium and Large emails sent by different organizational positions.

Figure 3. Results of exchanged emails. A) Average number of Sent and Received (as Cc and To) emails for Enron organizational positions from 2000 to 2001. B) Average number of Received emails as To and Cc for each organizational positions.
Figure 4. Contribution Index (CI) for organizational positions. A) Average of CI and To-CI. B) Average of Cc-CI.
Figure 4. Contribution Index (CI) for organizational positions. A) Average of CI and To-CI. B) Average of Cc-CI.
